items.title: Low Prices, Strong Demand, and the Cracks in the Oil Glut Story
items.summary: Almost 100% of oil market analysts see the market as oversupplied this year, just as it was oversupplied last year. The size of the supply overhang, however, matters. Led by the International Energy Agency, a lot of analysts predicted that the overha

items.title: The Looming LNG Glut and What It Means for Global Energy Prices

items.title: Trump Slashes Clean Energy Loans, Bets Big on Gas and Nuclear

items.title: Mexico Weighs Cuba Oil Cut as Trump Pressure Mounts
items.summary: Mexico is weighing whether to halt or scale back oil shipments to Cuba as concerns grow within President Claudia Sheinbaum’s government that continuing the policy could trigger retaliation from the United States, according to sources familiar with in
